thread.title: Wireless Companies to Start Small With 5G Rollouts

author: Drew FitzGerald
title: Wireless Companies to Start Small With 5G Rollouts
text:
BARCELONA—After a year of promising tests, wireless companies are finally setting deadlines for the rollout of the next wave of technology designed to revolutionize the way machines reach the internet.

A handful of companies in the U.S. and Asia are expected to start offering commercial fifth-generation, or 5G, service as soon as this year. Their plans will dominate much of the agenda at the coming week’s Mobile World Congress, the annual confab here where telecom companies and their suppliers meet to strike deals and market...
